item.title: Hello World
item.description: Our first program @autoupdate Var = table( array(1,2,3,4,-5) )

item.title: Introduction
item.description: About the course I welcome you to the tutorial series for all wiremod related. Here we will be exploring Expression 2 in all its glory. @name Hello World @inputs A B @outputs Add Sub Mul Div @outputs GreaterThan Highest Lowest @outputs Vector:vector @persist D @trigger all Add = A + B Sub = A - B Mul = A * B Div = A / B GreaterThan = A B if(A B) { Highest = A, Lowest = B } else { Highest = B, Lowest = A } Vector = vec(A, B, 0) Vector = Vector + vec(0, 0, A + B) Vector = Vector:normalized() Credits Upcoming list of shoutouts

item.description: Buttons button functionality qwe DD FF fsfsfsf gs
